update TOM_EXAM_PAPER
EXAM_PAPER_NUMBER = #{examPaperNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAM_PAPER_NAME = #{examPaperName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAM_PAPER_NAME_EN = #{examPaperNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAM_PAPER_TYPE = #{examPaperType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where EXAM_PAPER_ID = #{examPaperId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.select: select ep.* from tom_exam e join tom_exam_paper ep on ep.exam_paper_id = e.exam_paper_id where e.exam_id = #{_parameter}
